item.title: Setting up a Bastion host on AWS
item.description: When setting up my latest development environment at AWS, I wanted to deploy all EC2 services on a private VPC and simply route all traffic to them through a Bastion host (aka jump host). AWS maintains a an excellent CloudFormation quickstart guide & template here and it’s what I used to get started.
